Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage.api.network.grid

Interface IGridFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
GridBlockGridFactory, PortableGridBlockGridFactory, PortableGridGridFactory, WirelessFluidGridGridFactory, WirelessGridGridFactory
public interface IGridFactory
Creates a grid.

  • Method Details

    • createFromStack

      @Nullable IGrid createFromStack(net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack stack, PlayerSlot slot)
      Creates a grid from a stack. Used when getType() is STACK.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      stack - the stack
      slot - the slot in the players inventory or curio slot, otherwise -1
      Returns:
      the grid, or null if a problem occurred

    • createFromBlock

      @Nullable IGrid createFromBlock(net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos)
      Creates a grid from a block. Used when getType() is BLOCK.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      pos - the block position
      Returns:
      the grid, or null if a problem occurred

    • getRelevantBlockEntity

      @Nullable net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity getRelevantBlockEntity(net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos)
      Returns a possible block entity for this grid if getType() is BLOCK.
      Parameters:
      level - the level
      pos - the position
      Returns:
      the block entity, or null if no block entity is required

    • getType

      GridFactoryType getType()
      Returns:
      the type
